verses.roman:
ānuṣaṅga-karma ei asura-māraṇa
ye lāgi' avatāra, kahi se mūla kāraṇa

synonyms: ānuṣaṅga-karma—secondary work; ei—this; asura—of the demons; māraṇa—killing; ye—that; lāgi'-for; avatāra—the incarnation; kahi—I shall speak; se—the; mūla—root; kāraṇa—cause.
translation: Thus the killing of the demons is but secondary work. I shall now speak of the main reason for the Lord's incarnation.
